#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
	int i,j,n,*a,*d;
	cin>>n;
	a=new int[n];
	d=new int[n];
	for(i=0;i<n;i++)
	cin>>a[i];
	for(i=0;i<n;i++)
	cin>>d[i];
	int min=1000, max=0, full=0, everyi=0;
	for(i=0;i<n;i++)
	{
			if(a[i]<min)
			min=a[i];
			if(a[i]>max)
			max=a[i];
	}
	for(i=min;i<=max;i++)
	{
		everyi=0;
		for(j=0;j<n;j++)
		{
			if(a[j]<=i&&d[j]>i)
			everyi++;
		}
		if(everyi>full)
		full=everyi;
	}
	cout<<full<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
